content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Oh, I think I might have the wrong number. I didn't mean to contact a home service company.
I understand. Would you like me to mark this number as wrong number to avoid further messages from us?
Thank you for letting us know. This number will be marked as wrong number and you will not receive further messages from XYZ Home Services. Have a great day!
